name: Sunken ship's mystery
description:
Hey my name is Anti. At least that's how everyone calls me. What I am? I'm a treasure hunter and I have hired you to do some research for me in a sunken ship. I  heard that you are a really good diver. Some even said the best I would ever find. Yeah of course you get a reward. I can tell you it is not little. But if you now think you get a big reward for just a bit of diving,  l have to disappoint you. This is a really thing man. So I tell you a secret but shh. This treasure is bewitched. I think it was the god Poseidon how was made on some treasure thieves. So he destroyed their boat and enchanted the ship so nobody will ever get the treasure until they solve the puzzle. He don't be so shy. If it true what is being said about you it won't be to difficult. Many tricky puzzles are waiting for you to be solved. So go on...

Features:

funny dialogues

great self-made art

cool sounds and music

Controls:

Use A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

And E to collect items or do actions(eg. Flipping a switch)

Use the right Mousebutton to switch on your headlight to see more
